summary: 24 year old full stack developer with huge preference for backend and modern SPA frameworks over CSS and jQuery.
paragraphs: I've been developing in PHP and JS professionally for years, mostly with Laravel, Vue js and jQuery. But with my side projects I try to explore new tech, Go and React lately. I write about some of those projects in this blog.

I love programming challenges that require dedication, good problem-solving skills and continuous learning. I enjoy learning new technologies and design patterns on a daily basis as my side projects on my blog show.
